name: [NEOLITHIC]To the End (itch)
description:
The current version on itch.io is 20210507 (Steam may have a newer version)

This is currently just the demo version of a Steam game.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1519140/NeolithicTo_the_End/

Update logs can be found here:

https://store.steampowered.com/newshub/app/1519140?updates=true

Unfortunately, itch.io does not support frequent updates very well. (I am updating the demo almost every day on Steam)

But, someone told me maybe I shall consider throwing a copy here, too.

Using Steam is still highly recommended mostly because of its auto-update feature and you do not need to download the entire game every time.

I don't think I will update the game that often here on itch.io. (By that, I mean I am unlikely to update the game here every day. But, maybe every week or month.)

All criticisms/suggestions/feedback/bug reports are welcome as always.

Discord
